title: aandb89
author: aandb89
content: This bot is my own software development, analogue in private chat for traders cost from $5,000, access to certain trading pairs are selling for $500+ per pair, so this is a REALLY good deal.Buyers will receive LIFETIME access and support (in the form of updates with: filters, new coins and sites to the bot).Crypto bot is a unique opportunity to earn high income without leaving your home.Dozens of situations occur daily in the cryptocurrency market that allow you to get a decent profit with simple actions, and for this you do not need to have any in-depth knowledge in this area.What the bot does:- Bot scans some top crypto exchange sites (Binance, Bybit, Bitget, Kucoin, Gate, Okx, Mexc, Huobi and more to come with updates) in real time to find profitable trading pair with a good difference in the rate of cryptocurrencies so that you can BUY cheaper and SELL with good profit.- Your task is very simple: Buy what the bot says > Transfer currency where the bot telling you > Sell with profit!How it works:- The bot will be linked to your Telegram account and instantly send you all new hot deals in private messages (new trading pairs coming in your notifications almost every minute!)- You can work WHEN and WHERE you want. You receive messages with complete information in Telegram (where, what and at what price to buy and sell) so you can make transactions from your phone anywhere.How much can you earn:- Income depends on your starting capital, the higher it is, the more you can earn.- Income per transaction goes from 1.5% to 5% per 1 deal: so with a total of $1000 per ONE transaction with a spread of 3% (price difference), we will receive an income of $30. And this is for ONE transaction, for 10-15 MINUTES. Sometimes income for one transaction reaches 10-20% and this is just with 10-15 minutes of the time spent, and you can manage to carry out many transactions like that per day.It doesn't matter if you are a beginner or an expert on cryptocurrencies - feel free to write to me. I can tell you in more detail how it works, also this bot includes simple instructions on how to start for the very beginners.For purchases and questions, write to my Telegram: @aandb89Price: 500$Preview Images:https://i.ibb.co/BzVHGG8/1ee.pnghttps://i.ibb.co/n85sr2x/2e.pnghttps://i.ibb.co/RgQ4rjF/3e.pnghttps://i.ibb.co/w4v5kmX/4e.pnghttps://i.ibb.co/9gbNMBP/5e.png

comments.author: aandb89
comments.body: The bot has been updated!What has been added:- Improved bot message interface in Telegram: now bot automatically calculates the percentage of profit, as well as income with a transaction volume of $1000. Website thumbnails have also been removed for easy selection.An example of a signal from a bot:https://i.ibb.co/4MDdjRM/paire.pngIn future updates, it is planned to integrate more advanced filters by available volume and network compatibility. All updates for users are free.

comments.author: aandb89
comments.body: The bot has been updated!What has been added:- The algorithm for filtering trading pairs by volume has been redesigned: now, when analyzing the pair, the bot focuses on the available volume at the current moment, as well as on the real demand based on the latest transactions on the order book. This made it possible to almost completely filter out pairs with low income of a few dollars per operation.- Improved filtering of trading pairs by network compatibility.Last night there were a lot of arbitrage situations on the NTVRK coin, the spread at the peak reached 18% with average volumes up to $3000:Buy:from 0.0990 to 0.1040 | ntvrk/usdt - MexcSell:from 0.1090 to 0.1130 | ntvrk/usdt - KucoinTotal Purchase: $1350Income: $119

comments.author: aandb89
comments.body: The bot has been updated!What has been added:- Improved network availability detection function. Now the bot automatically determines not only whether the network is available for transfer, but also which network (eth, bep, own) and the approximate transfer fee:Image: https://i.ibb.co/WKwBsPt/upd22e.pngThis trading pair has been active since yesterday evening with a peak spread of 6.5% this morning, here are the results of one trade:Buy:0.01028 - 0.01030 | stnd/usdt - MexcSell:0.01085 - 0.01091 | stnd/usdt - KucoinVolume = $2377Income: $129

comments.author: aandb89
comments.body: Global updates of crypto artibtrage bot are online!What has been added:- Now the bot can determine the volume available at the moment of a deal! Due to this, the high speed and consumption of work with the bot also develops the ability to detect illiquid pairs in the notifications from the bot;- Reduced delay between order book evaluation and Telegram compliance. Now it happens almost instantly. The delay is fractions of a second;- Filtering pairs by the availability of hedging (futures contract) for both selling and buying. Now the bot immediately detects the possibility of using hedging on a specific coin and exchange;- Filtering coins by the availability of margin trading (leverage) for both selling and buying coins. Now the bot immediately detected the possibility of using margin on a particular coin and exchange. Identifications take place the same formations as hedging filtering. First is always an exchange of purchase, the second - sale. The presence of only the " | " symbol in the notification means that the leverage is not available;- Small interface changes in the shelves with an eye for future updates.https://i.ibb.co/GQQs5y6/eng-upd.png

comments.author: aandb89
comments.body: ⚡️Bot update released⚡️What was changed/added:- Complete reworking of filtering algorithms in collaboration with several traders. Now high-quality filtering is available to all users, regardless of the tariff: By default, bundles are oriented towards a bank of ~1.5-2K$, allowing you to receive significantly more liquid bundles, but options for banks up to $1000 are practically eliminated (via LAN you can ask to change the filtering back for your account). This became particularly necessary in December, when volumes in such bundles began to disappear in just a couple of minutes;- Blocking coins that are not available for transfer on the huobi (htx) exchange;- The speed of the bot on weak PCs in the “Trader” and “Pro” tariffs has been significantly increased;- A beta version of automatic trading via the Api of supported exchanges is available on the “Pro” tariff;- Reworking the bot for parsing and filtering coins on the “Pro” tariff;- Other small changes.This is the last major update for this year, with plans to rework the network detection feature next year to always display accurate information about both the transfer network and fees.
